ChatMessage.title: Chat Message
ChatMessage.description: Represents a single message in a user's chat history.

id.description: Unique identifier for the chat message.

userId.description: Reference to the User who owns this message.

content.description: The text content of the message.

timestamp.description: The time the message was sent.

Income.title: Income
Income.description: Represents a source of income for a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the income entry.

userId.description: Reference to the User who owns this income entry. (Relationship: User 1:N Income)

category.description: The category of income (e.g., salary, investment).

date.description: The date the income was received.

description.description: Optional description or notes about the income.

clientId.description: Optional reference to the Client associated with this income.

Expense.title: Expense
Expense.description: Represents an expense incurred by a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the expense entry.

userId.description: Reference to the User who owns this expense entry. (Relationship: User 1:N Expense)

category.description: The category of expense (e.g., food, rent).

date.description: The date the expense was incurred.

description.description: Optional description or notes about the expense.

clientId.description: Optional reference to the Client associated with this expense.

Creditor.title: Creditor
Creditor.description: Represents a person or entity to whom the user owes money.

userId.description: Reference to the User who owes this debt. (Relationship: User 1:N Creditor)

amount.description: The amount owed to the creditor.

dueDate.description: The date the debt is due.

description.description: Optional description or notes about the debt.

Debtor.title: Debtor
Debtor.description: Represents a person or entity who owes money to the user.

userId.description: Reference to the User who is owed this debt. (Relationship: User 1:N Debtor)

amount.description: The amount owed by the debtor.

dueDate.description: The date the debt is due.

description.description: Optional description or notes about the debt.

User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the application.

email.description: The email address of the user.

BankAccount.title: Bank Account
BankAccount.description: Represents a bank account for a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the bank account.

userId.description: Reference to the User who owns this account.

name.description: The name of the bank account (e.g., 'Savings', 'Checking').

balance.description: The current balance of the account.

isPrimary.description: Indicates if this is the user's primary bank account.

Client.title: Client
Client.description: Represents a client or contact for a specific business/project.

projectId.description: Reference to the Project this client belongs to.

Category.title: Category
Category.description: Represents a custom income or expense category for a specific business/project.

projectId.description: Reference to the Project this category belongs to.

Task.title: Task
Task.description: Represents a task to be tracked by a user.

userId.description: Reference to the User who owns this task.

projectId.description: Optional reference to the Project this task belongs to.

name.description: The name or title of the task.

description.description: A detailed description of the task.

status.description: The current status of the task.

dueDate.description: The date when the task is due.

createdAt.description: The date when the task was created.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier of the user.
